KnowMe.title: Let's get to know me better
KnowMe.description: Graduated as a full-stack engineer with a strong background in web development and a deep focus on security. I’m passionate about applying my skills to challenging projects and delivering innovative solutions. This portfolio highlights my diverse range of work, from sleek web designs to robust, secure applications. My journey as a developer is driven by the desire to build impactful, high-performing web solutions.

Skills.title: Skills
Skills.header: From Websites & Mobile to networking and data management
Skills.subtitle: I’ve had the opportunity to work across all kinds of tools

ProjectsOverview.title: Projects
ProjectsOverview.project-1-description: Strong cast e-commerce project aims to establish a robust online platform for selling high quality fishing lines in the USA market. As a web engineer, my role involves crafting a seamless user experience, efficient product management, and adherence to industry best practices. By leveraging Next.js and Shopify technologies, I am poised to create a customized solution that caters to Strong cast specific needs.

Services.title: Services
Services.services-title: Optimized Web Solutions for Every Need
Services.services-subtitle: From development to deployment, I build efficient, scalable web applications.
Services.card-2-description: Scalable server-side solutions with NestJS and Node.
Services.card-3-description: Full-featured online stores with seamless integrations.
Services.card-4-description: RESTful and GraphQL APIs for all platforms.
